text: Te, kto ne uveroval v Allakha, skazali poslanniku Allakha - da blagoslovit yego Allakh i privetstvuyet: "Nashi serdtsa zakryty dlya togo, chtoby slushat' tvoy prizyv k yedinobozhiyu i pokloneniyu Allakhu, i nashi ushi glukhi k etomu. My ne slyshim to, k chemu ty nas prizyvayesh'. Mezhdu nami i toboy - prochnaya zavesa, i ona meshayet nam prinyat' to, s chem ty prishol. Delay to, chto ty zhelayesh', a my delayem to, chto my khotim
